name: optiframe-backend
description: Backend API for OptiFrame AR eyewear ecommerce platform

scripts.kill-ports: node -e "const { exec } = require('child_process'); [5000, 5001, 3001, 8000].forEach(p => { exec(`netstat -ano | findstr :${p}`, (e, o) => { if (o) { const pid = o.split(/\s+/).pop(); if (pid) exec(`taskkill /PID ${pid} /F`, () => console.log(`Killed process on port ${p}`)); } }); });"
